fields.name: userID
fields.description: Identifier for the user who executed the run

fields.name: modelUsed
fields.description: AI model used for the API request

fields.name: inputTokens
fields.description: Number of input tokens used in the run

fields.name: outputTokens
fields.description: Number of output tokens generated in the run

fields.name: totalTime
fields.description: Total execution time for the run in seconds

fields.name: filesAttached
fields.description: Boolean flag indicating whether files were attached to the request

fields.name: httpCode
fields.description: HTTP status code returned by the request
